00049 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 /** @defgroup MCTM_Exported_Types MCTM exported types
00051   * @{
00052   */
00053 /**
00054  * @brief Enumeration of MCTM channel output idle state.
00055  */
00056 /**
00057  * @brief Definition of Break & DeadTime init structure.
00058  */
00059 typedef struct
00060 {
00061   u32 OSSRState;
00062   u32 OSSIState;
00063   u32 LockLevel;
00064   u32 Break0;
00065   u32 Break0Polarity;
00066   u32 AutomaticOutput;
00067   u8 DeadTime;
00068   u8 BreakFilter;
00069 } MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitTypeDef;
00070 
00071 typedef union
00072 {
00073   struct
00074   {
00075     /* Definitions of CHBRKCTR                                                                              */
00076     unsigned long Break0           :1; // BK0E
00077     unsigned long Break0Polarity   :1; // BK0P
00078     #if (LIBCFG_TM_652XX_V1)
00079     unsigned long Break1           :1; // BK1E
00080     unsigned long Break1Polarity   :1; // BK1E
00081     #else
00082     unsigned long                  :1;
00083     unsigned long                  :1;
00084     #endif
00085     unsigned long                  :1; // CHMOE
00086     unsigned long AutomaticOutput  :1; // CHAOE
00087     #if (LIBCFG_TM_65232)
00088     unsigned long Break0FromCMP0   :1; // BK0CMP0
00089     unsigned long Break0FromCMP1   :1; // BK0CMP1
00090     #else
00091     unsigned long                  :1;
00092     unsigned long                  :1;
00093     #endif
00094 
00095     #if (LIBCFG_TM_652XX_V1)
00096     unsigned long Break0EventCount :2; // BK0FN
00097     unsigned long Break0FDiv       :2; // BK0FF
00098     unsigned long Break1EventCount :2; // BK1FN
00099     unsigned long Break1FDiv       :2; // BK1FF
00100     #else
00101     unsigned long Break0Filter     :4; // BK0F
00102     unsigned long                  :4;
00103     #endif
00104 
00105     unsigned long LockLevel        :2; // LOCKLV
00106     unsigned long DeglitchFilte    :1; // GFSEL
00107     unsigned long                  :1;
00108     unsigned long OSSIState        :1; // CHOSSI
00109     unsigned long OSSRState        :1; // CHOSSR
00110     #if (LIBCFG_TM_65232)
00111     unsigned long Break1FromCMP0   :1; // BK1CMP0
00112     unsigned long Break1FromCMP1   :1; // BK1CMP1
00113     #else
00114     unsigned long                  :1;
00115     unsigned long                  :1;
00116     #endif
00117 
00118     unsigned long DeadTime         :8; // CHDTG
00119   } Bit;
00120   u32 Reg;
00121 } MCTM_CHBRKCTRTypeDef;
00122 /**
00123   * @}
00124   */

00126 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00127 /** @defgroup MCTM_Exported_Constants MCTM exported constants
00128   * @{
00129   */
00130 
00131 /** @defgroup MCTM_BKE Definitions of MCTM break control
00132   * @{
00133   */
00134 #define MCTM_BREAK_ENABLE           0x00000001 /*!< Break enable                                            */
00135 #define MCTM_BREAK_DISABLE          0x00000000 /*!< Break disable                                           */
00136 /**
00137   * @}
00138   */
00139 
00140 /** @defgroup MCTM_BKP Definitions of MCTM break polarity
00141   * @{
00142   */
00143 #define MCTM_BREAK_POLARITY_LOW     0x00000000 /*!< Break input pin active low level                        */
00144 #define MCTM_BREAK_POLARITY_HIGH    0x00000002 /*!< Break input pin active high level                       */
00145 /**
00146   * @}
00147   */
00148 
00149 /** @defgroup MCTM_CHMOE Definitions of MCTM main output enable function state
00150   * @{
00151   */
00152 #define MCTM_CHMOE_DISABLE          0x00000000 /*!< main output disable                                     */
00153 #define MCTM_CHMOE_ENABLE           0x00000010 /*!< Main output enable                                      */
00154 /**
00155   * @}
00156   */
00157 
00158 /** @defgroup MCTM_CHAOE Definitions of MCTM automatic output enable function state
00159   * @{
00160   */
00161 #define MCTM_CHAOE_DISABLE          0x00000000 /*!< Automatic output enable function disable                */
00162 #define MCTM_CHAOE_ENABLE           0x00000020 /*!< Automatic output enable function enable                 */
00163 /**
00164   * @}
00165   */
00166 
00167 /** @defgroup MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL Definitions of MCTM lock level selection
00168   * @{
00169   */
00170 #define MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_OFF                 0x00000000 /*!< Lock Off                                        */
00171 #define MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_1                   0x00010000 /*!< Lock level 1                                    */
00172 #define MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_2                   0x00020000 /*!< Lock level 2                                    */
00173 #define MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_3                   0x00030000 /*!< Lock level 3                                    */
00174 /**
00175   * @}
00176   */
00177 
00178 /** @defgroup MCTM_OSSI Definitions of Off-State Selection for Idle mode states
00179   * @{
00180   */
00181 #define MCTM_OSSI_STATE_ENABLE              0x00100000
00182 #define MCTM_OSSI_STATE_DISABLE             0x00000000
00183 /**
00184   * @}
00185   */
00186 
00187 /** @defgroup MCTM_OSSR Definitions of Off-State Selection for Run mode states
00188   * @{
00189   */
00190 #define MCTM_OSSR_STATE_ENABLE              0x00200000
00191 #define MCTM_OSSR_STATE_DISABLE             0x00000000
00192 /**
00193   * @}
00194   */
00195 
00196 /** @defgroup MCTM_Check_Parameter Check parameter
00197   * @{
00198   */
00199 
00200 /**
00201  * @brief Used to check parameter of the MCTMx.
00202  */
00203 #define IS_MCTM(x)          (IS_MCTM0(x))
00204 
00205 #if (LIBCFG_MCTM0)
00206 #define IS_MCTM0(x)         (x == HT_MCTM0)
00207 #else
00208 #define IS_MCTM0(x)         (0)
00209 #endif
00210 
00211 /**
00212  * @brief Used to check parameter of the complementary output channel.
00213  */
00214 #define IS_MCTM_COMPLEMENTARY_CH(x) (((x) == TM_CH_0) || ((x) == TM_CH_1) || \
00215                                      ((x) == TM_CH_2))
00216 /**
00217  * @brief Used to check parameter of the COMUS.
00218  */
00219 #define IS_MCTM_COMUS(x)  ((x == MCTM_COMUS_STIOFF) || (x == MCTM_COMUS_STION))
00220 /**
00221  * @brief Used to check parameter of the channel output idle state.
00222  */
00223 #define IS_MCTM_OIS(x)  ((x == MCTM_OIS_LOW) || (x == MCTM_OIS_HIGH))
00224 /**
00225  * @brief Used to check value of MCTM break control state.
00226  */
00227 #define IS_MCTM_BREAK_STATE(STATE)  (((STATE) == MCTM_BREAK_ENABLE) || \
00228                                      ((STATE) == MCTM_BREAK_DISABLE))
00229 /**
00230  * @brief Used to check value of MCTM break polarity.
00231  */
00232 #define IS_MCTM_BREAK_POLARITY(POLARITY)    (((POLARITY) == MCTM_BREAK_POLARITY_LOW) || \
00233                                              ((POLARITY) == MCTM_BREAK_POLARITY_HIGH))
00234 /**
00235  * @brief Used to check value of MCTM automatic output enable control state.
00236  */
00237 #define IS_MCTM_CHAOE_STATE(STATE)  (((STATE) == MCTM_CHAOE_ENABLE) || \
00238                                      ((STATE) == MCTM_CHAOE_DISABLE))
00239 /**
00240  * @brief Used to check value of MCTM lock level.
00241  */
00242 #define IS_MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL(LEVEL)   (((LEVEL) == MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_OFF) || \
00243                                      ((LEVEL) == MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_1) || \
00244                                      ((LEVEL) == MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_2) || \
00245                                      ((LEVEL) == MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_3))
00246 /**
00247  * @brief Used to check value of MCTM OSSI state.
00248  */
00249 #define IS_MCTM_OSSI_STATE(STATE)   (((STATE) == MCTM_OSSI_STATE_ENABLE) || \
00250                                      ((STATE) == MCTM_OSSI_STATE_DISABLE))
00251 /**
00252  * @brief Used to check value of MCTM OSSR state.
00253  */
00254 #define IS_MCTM_OSSR_STATE(STATE)   (((STATE) == MCTM_OSSR_STATE_ENABLE) || \
00255                                      ((STATE) == MCTM_OSSR_STATE_DISABLE))
00256 /**
00257   * @}
00258   */
00259 
00260 /**
00261   * @}
00262   */
00263
